Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Cup
Description: A cup, wheel-made from a buff-coloured clay with an organic temper, with a flattened base. Some parts of its lip have been chipped. There is no apparent sign of any decoration, though there are several patches of white slip. Though slightly asymmetrical, a good quality work.
